refsect1.title: CONFIG SECTIONS
refsect1.para: At present, the only config section known to the IPsec software is the one named setup, which contains information used when the software is being started (see ipsec_setup8). Here's an example:

literallayout.emphasis: config setup interfaces="ipsec0=eth1 ipsec1=ppp0" klipsdebug=none plutodebug=control protostack=auto
